name: swarm.public.dappnode.eth
description:
[Swarm](https://www.ethswarm.org/) is an **incentivised**, decentralised data storage and distribution technology. With *research driven development*, Swarm achieves alignment between node operators and content publishers, ushering in the next generation of censorship-resistant, unstoppable, serverless dapps.


Learn about all you can do today with Swarm in the [Swarm documentation](https://docs.ethswarm.org/).
shortDescription: Storage and communication infrastructure for a sovereign digital society
author: rndlabs <packages@rndlabs.xyz> (https://github.com/rndlabs)

exposable.name: Bee P2P Port
exposable.description: P2P port for swarming with other bees
